name: events
description: This table contains all events that happen on Bindle's website pages. Events are tracked during a pageview, that's why there's a has-many relation between pageviews and events.

columns.name: pageview_id
columns.description: Category parameter of an event, for example Signup.

columns.name: category
columns.description: Action parameter of an event, for example Click.

columns.name: action
columns.description: Name parameter of an event, for example Signup for free.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Unique identifier of a record inside pageviews table. All events happen within one pageview. ⚠️
